name: NPC Adventure
description:
This is the 37th time the game has been played and, well, you're kinda tired of it.

Go as a group of 4 background characters and hijack the hero's adventure, go across the entire in-game world along with seeing what goes on underneath the code. Enemies, meta humor and a lot of 4th wall breaks. Time to see what kind of hijinks ensue.

Made to be used on Windows 10
